languages.text: "Лишь в твоих глазах, элантах. Но зная о страхах и мнительности твоего вида... Пожалуй, мне стоило предвидеть подобную реакцию".
"Only in your eyes, elantach. But knowing how fearful and mistrustful your species is, I suppose I should have foreseen such a reaction."
languages.original_text: "Лишь в твоих глазах, элантах. Но зная о страхах и мнительности твоего вида... Пожалуй, мне стоило предвидеть подобную реакцию".

traits.locale_text: "Only in your eyes, elantach. But knowing how fearful and mistrustful your species is. I suppose I should have foreseen such a reaction."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Only in your eyes, elantach. But knowing how fearful and mistrustful your species is. I suppose I should have foreseen such a reaction."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Only in your eyes, elantach. But knowing how fearful and mistrustful your species is, I suppose I should have foreseen such a reaction."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Only in your eyes, elantach. But knowing how fearful and mistrustful your species is, I suppose I should have foreseen such a reaction."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Only in your eyes, elantach. But knowing how fearful and mistrustful your species is, I suppose I should have foreseen such a reaction."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “只有你这么认为，外界人。不过，我已经了解了人类有多么怯懦、多么多疑。你会有这样的反应，我丝毫不觉得意外。”
languages.original_text: "Only in your eyes, elantach. But knowing how fearful and mistrustful your species is, I suppose I should have foreseen such a reaction."

traits.locale_text: “只有你这么认为，外界人。不过，我已经了解了人类有多么怯懦、多么多疑。你会有这样的反应，我丝毫不觉得意外。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Solo a tus ojos, elantach. Pero sabiendo lo aprensiva y desconfiada que es tu especie, imagino que debí haber anticipado tal reacción».
languages.original_text: "Only in your eyes, elantach. But knowing how fearful and mistrustful your species is, I suppose I should have foreseen such a reaction."

traits.locale_text: «Solo a tus ojos, elantach. Pero sabiendo lo aprensiva y desconfiada que es tu especie, imagino que debí haber anticipado tal reacción».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Seulement à vos yeux, elantach. Mais connaissant la méfiance et la poltronnerie de votre espèce, j'aurais dû anticiper ce genre de réaction. »
languages.original_text: "Only in your eyes, elantach. But knowing how fearful and mistrustful your species is, I suppose I should have foreseen such a reaction."

traits.locale_text: « Seulement à vos yeux, elantach. Mais connaissant la méfiance et la poltronnerie de votre espèce, j'aurais dû anticiper ce genre de réaction. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Nur in Euren Augen, Elantach. Aber da ich weiß, wie ängstlich und misstrauisch Eure Spezies ist, hätte ich so eine Reaktion wohl vorausahnen sollen."
languages.original_text: "Only in your eyes, elantach. But knowing how fearful and mistrustful your species is, I suppose I should have foreseen such a reaction."

traits.locale_text: "Nur in Euren Augen, Elantach. Aber da ich weiß, wie ängstlich und misstrauisch Eure Spezies ist, hätte ich so eine Reaktion wohl vorausahnen sollen."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「エランタよ、お前の目にはそう映るのだろう。だが、お前の種族がどれほど恐れを抱き、不信感を抱いているかを知っていたのだから、お前がそのような反応をするだろうと予測すべきだった」
languages.original_text: "Only in your eyes, elantach. But knowing how fearful and mistrustful your species is, I suppose I should have foreseen such a reaction."

traits.locale_text: 「エランタよ、お前の目にはそう映るのだろう。だが、お前の種族がどれほど恐れを抱き、不信感を抱いているかを知っていたのだから、お前がそのような反応をするだろうと予測すべきだった」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Sana göre öyle olabilir elantach. Gerçi türünün ne kadar korkak ve güvensiz olduğunu düşününce böyle bir tepki alacağımı tahmin etmem gerekirdi."
languages.original_text: "Only in your eyes, elantach. But knowing how fearful and mistrustful your species is, I suppose I should have foreseen such a reaction."

traits.locale_text: "Sana göre öyle olabilir elantach. Fakat türünün ne kadar korkak ve güvensiz olduğunu düşününce sanırım böyle bir tepki alacağımı tahmin etmem gerekirdi."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
